Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.name: xShift
Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.abstract: The horizontal shift currently set, applied to the whole screen and to all layouts, pages etc…

Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.name: yShift
Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.abstract: The vertical shift currently set, applied to the whole screen and to all layouts, pages etc…

Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.name: luma
Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.abstract: The current display luminance, as an Integer between 0 and 15

Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.name: brightnessAdjustmentEnabled
Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.abstract: true if the auto brightness adjustment sensor is enabled, false otherwise

Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.name: gestureDetectionEnabled
Structs/GlassesSettings.html#/s:13Active.abstract: true if the auto gesture detection sensor is enabled, false otherwise

Enums/LedState.html.name: LedState
Enums/LedState.html.abstract: Available states for the glasses’ green LED

Classes/SensorParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: alsArray
Classes/SensorParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The ALS array to compare to when luma is changed.

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: x
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The x coordinate of the start position (upper left) of the layout area

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: y
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The y coordinate of the start position (upper left) of the layout area

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: foregroundColor
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The foreground color of the layout area from 0 to 15

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: backgroundColor
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The background color of the layout area from 0 to 15

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: font
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: The font used to draw the text value of the layout

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: textValid
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: Define if the argument of the layout is displayed using text

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: textX
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: Define the x coordinate of the position of the text value in the layout area

Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.name: textY
Classes/LayoutParameters.html#/s:13Activ.abstract: Define the y coordinate of the position of the text value in the layout area

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: name
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: The name of the glasses, as advertised over Bluetooth.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: identifier
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: The identifier of the glasses, as advertised over Bluetooth. It is not guaranteed to be unique over a certain period and across sessions.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: manufacturerId
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: The manufacturer id as set on the device as a hex string.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: disconnect()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Disconnect from the glasses.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: onDisconnect(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set the callback to be called when the connection to the glasses is lost.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: getDeviceInformation()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get information relative to the device as published over Bluetooth.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: power(on:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Power the device on or off.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: clear()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Clear the whole screen.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: grey(level:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: /// Set the whole display to the corresponding grey level

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: demo()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the demonstration pattern

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: test(pattern:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the test pattern

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: battery(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get the battery level

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: vers(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get the glasses version parameters such as device ID and firmware version

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: debug(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Return BLE data to USB

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: led(state:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set the state of the green LED

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: shift(x:y:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Shift all subsequent displayed object of (x,y) pixels

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: settings(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get the glasses settings such as screen shift, luma and sensor information

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: setName(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set a customized BLE advertising name.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: luma(level:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set the display luminance to the corresponding level

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: dim(level:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Reduce luminance to given percentage

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: sensor(enabled:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Turn on/off the auto brightness adjustment and gesture detection

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: gesture(enabled:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Turn on/off the gesture detection

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: als(enabled:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Turn on/off the auto brightness adjustment

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: setSensorParameters(mode:sensorParameters:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: /// Set optical sensor parameters. Only the parameters corresponding to the specified mode will be set.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: getSensorParameters(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get sensor parameters (ALS Array, ALS Period and ranging Period).

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: color(level:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Sets the grey level used to draw the next graphical element

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: point(x:y:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set a pixel on at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: line(x0:x1:y0:y1:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Draw a line at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: rect(x0:x1:y0:y1:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Draw an empty rectangle at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: rectf(x0:x1:y0:y1:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Draw a full rectangle at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: circ(x:y:radius:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Draw an empty circle at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: circf(x:y:radius:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Draw a full circle at the corresponding coordinates

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: txt(x:y:rotation:font:color:string:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Write the specified string at the specified coordinates, with rotation, font size and color

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgList(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: List all images saved on the device.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgSave(imageData:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Save a 4bpp image of the specified width.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgDisplay(id:x:y:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the image corresponding to the specified id at the specified position

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgDelete(id:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Delete the specified image

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgStream(imageData:x:y:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: WARNING: NOT TESTED / NOT FULLY IMPLEMENTED

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: imgSave1bpp(imageData:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: WARNING: NOT TESTED / NOT FULLY IMPLEMENTED

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: fontlist()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: WARNING: CALLBACK NOT WORKING as of 3.7.4b

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: fontSave(id:fontData:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Save a font to the specified font id

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: fontSelect(id:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Select font which will be used for followings txt commands

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: fontDelete(id:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Delete the font corresponding to the specified font id if present

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutSave(parameters:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Save a new layout according to the specified layout parameters.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutDelete(id:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Delete the specified layout

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutDisplay(id:text:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the specified layout with the specified text as its value

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutClear(id:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Clear the layout area corresponding to the specified layout id

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutPosition(id:x:y:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Redefine the position of a layout. The new position is saved.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: layoutDisplayExtended(id:x:y:text:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the specified layout at the specified position with the specified value. Position is not saved

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: gaugeDisplay(id:value:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Display the specified gauge with the specified value

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: gaugeSave(id:x:y:externalRadius:internalRadius:start:end:clockwise:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Save a gauge for the specified id with the specified parameters.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: pageList()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: WARNING: NOT TESTED / NOT FULLY IMPLEMENTED

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: pixelCount(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get number of pixel activated on display

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: setPixelValue(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set the maximum amount of pixels that can be displayed

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: getChargingCounter(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get total number of charging cycles

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: getChargingTime(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get total number of charging minutes

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: getMaxPixelValue(_:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Get the maximum number of pixel activated

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: resetChargingParam()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Reset charging counter and charging time values

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: writeConfigID(configuration:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Write configuration. The configuration id is used to track which config is on the device

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: readConfigID(number:callback:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Read configuration.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: setConfigID(number:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Set current configuration to display images, layouts and fonts.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: subscribeToBatteryLevelNotifications(onBatteryLevelUpdate:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Subscribe to battery level notifications. The specified callback will return the battery value about once every thirty seconds.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: subscribeToFlowControlNotifications(onFlowControlUpdate:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Subscribe to flow control notifications. The specified callback will be called whenever the flow control state changes.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: subscribeToSensorInterfaceNotifications(onSensorInterfaceTriggered:)
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Subscribe to sensor interface notifications. The specified callback will be called whenever a gesture has been detected.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: unsubscribeFromBatteryLevelNotifications()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Unsubscribe from battery level notifications.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: unsubscribeFromFlowControlNotifications()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Unsubscribe from flow control notifications.

Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.name: unsubscribeFromSensorInterfaceNotifications()
Classes/Glasses.html#/s:13ActiveLookSDK7.abstract: Unsubscribe from sensor interface notifications.

Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.name: name
Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.abstract: The name of the glasses, as advertised over Bluetooth.

Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.name: identifier
Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.abstract: The identifier of the glasses, as advertised over Bluetooth. It is not guaranteed to be unique over a certain period and across sessions.

Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.name: manufacturerId
Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.abstract: The manufacturer id as set on the device as a hex string.

Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.name: connect(onGlassesConnected:onGlassesDisconnected:onConnectionError:)
Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html#/s:13Acti.abstract: Connect to the discovered glasses. Once the connection has been established over Buetooth, the glasses still need to be initialized before being considered as ‘connected’.

Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.name: shared
Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.abstract: The shared instance of the ActiveLook SDK.

Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.name: startScanning(onGlassesDiscovered:onScanError:)
Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.abstract: Start scanning for ActiveLook glasses. Will keep scanning until stopScanning() is called.

Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.name: isScanning()
Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html#/s:13ActiveLo.abstract: Check whether the ActiveLookSDK is currently scanning.

Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html.name: ActiveLookSDK
Classes/ActiveLookSDK.html.abstract: The main entry point to interacting with ActiveLook glasses.

Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html.name: DiscoveredGlasses
Classes/DiscoveredGlasses.html.abstract: A representation of ActiveLook® glasses, discovered while scanning for Bluetooth devices.

Classes/FontData.html.name: FontData
Classes/FontData.html.abstract: Data describing a font that can be saved on the device.

Classes/ImageData.html.name: ImageData
Classes/ImageData.html.abstract: Data describing an image that can be saved on the device.

Classes/ImageInfo.html.name: ImageInfo
Classes/ImageInfo.html.abstract: Information about an Image. Not an actual image object.
